DESCRIPTION: blinky the three-eyed fish appears near the nuclear plant. the japanese pm eats fukushima fish.

PREDICTION: controversies over david in st. petersburg (2016) and a florida school (2023).

DESCRIPTION: it is mentioned that melanie griffith and don johnson are going to separate.
PREDICTION: melanie griffith and don johnson separated in 1994.

DESCRIPTION: ringo starr is seen responding to countless fan letters.
PREDICTION: paul mccartney replied to a letter sent by two fans 50 years prior (1963-2013).

DESCRIPTION: homer designs "the homer," a ridiculous and futuristic car priced at $82,000.
PREDICTION: the launch of elon musk's cybertruck.

DESCRIPTION: herb invents a device capable of decoding babies' babbling.
PREDICTION: apps like cry translator and zoundream exist today.

PREDICTION: the yankees manager benched don mattingly for not cutting his hair (1993).

PREDICTION: a billboard for *kill bill* showed the character's blood splashing outside the sign in new zealand.

DESCRIPTION: homer sues an all-you-can-eat restaurant for deceptive advertising after being kicked out.
PREDICTION: a man from springfield, ma, sued golden corral for deceptive advertising after being expelled.

DESCRIPTION: a picture shows two towers with a destroyed plane (coincidence visual).
PREDICTION: september 11, 2001, attacks.

DESCRIPTION: burns finds his teddy bear, bobo, after a long time in a buried box.
PREDICTION: a 100+ year-old teddy bear was found in a time capsule in 2013.

DESCRIPTION: gunter and ernst (siegfried and roy parody) are attacked by their trained white tiger.
PREDICTION: roy horn was attacked by his tiger, montecore, during a live show in 2003.

PREDICTION: the movie *batman & robin* (1997) became infamous for mr. freeze's terrible puns.

DESCRIPTION: lisa is concerned about the message of the doll. / the anchor briefly mentions that "the president was arrested."
PREDICTION: the *barbie* movie (2023). / president donald trump was arrested (2023).

DESCRIPTION: the message "beat up martin" is autocorrected to "eat up martha" (apple newton).

DESCRIPTION: homer and bart work together to retrieve springfield's lemon tree after it is stolen.

DESCRIPTION: mr. burns blocks the sun with a giant disc to force citizens to use his power.
PREDICTION: george soros' proposal to use a cloud layer over the arctic (geoengineering).

DESCRIPTION: cypress hill performs with the london symphony orchestra after hiring them.
PREDICTION: cypress hill and the london symphony orchestra performed together in 2024.

PREDICTION: the ipod is invented.

DESCRIPTION: marge reads bart a book titled "**curious george and the ebola virus**."
